籤詩版本二:
Ndikucebisa ukuba ungaceli uncedo kuye, uphaphazela njengekrene, akutole ngeentolo ezifihlakeleyo.
Ukuba uyotheza iinkuni kwaye kukho inyoka engceni, unokulunywa yityhefu kwaye ube lusizi.
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokuhlala ukhuselekile kwaye uzigcine.
Lumka kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Vala umlomo wakho kwaye ubambe amazinyo akho. Akakhathali. Ukuba uziva unetyala. Ekugqibeleni kuyazenzakalisa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Intlanganiso ye-Chessboard
U-Emperor Taizong we-Tang Dynasty wayematsha esiya ngasentshona kwaye wayevaleleke kwisiXeko saseSuoyang. U-Cheng Yaojin wabuyela eBeijing ukuya kucela uqinisekiso.
UXue Dingshan wayalelwa ukuba asebenze njengoMarshal weNdlela yesiBini waza waya kuhlangula iNkosi aze athomalalise uXiliao.
Emva kokuba iqela labantu liphuma eYumen Pass, lafika kwiNtaba yaseQipan. Erhangqwe ngamawakawaka amahlakani entabeni, uDou Yihu, ukumkani wale ntaba, woyiswa yinjengele yaseTang uLuo Tong. Ngethamsanqa, udade wabo uDou Xiantong wayengumfundi kaMama Ongcwele weentyatyambo eziMthubi kwaye wayelichule kubugcisa bokulwa. wabamba intambo yasentsomini wambopha uLuo Tong.
(Umbongo osayiniweyo uyangqinelana noku)
U-Dou Xiantong wabona ubuhle buka-Xue Dingshan waza wafuna ukuba ngumhlobo kaFeng Luan, kodwa uXue Dingshan wala. Kamva, uDou Yihu wakhokelela abazalwana baseQipanshan ukuba babuyele kwi-Tang Dynasty ukuze bancede i-Tang Dynasty yoyise i-Western Liao.
聖意: Ukhuseleko lwasekhaya, ukuzicingela, ukufuna ubutyebi, ukulinda ixesha, ukudodobala kweshishini, umtshato awuvumelekanga, i-alamu yobuxoki yaseLiujia, abahambi ngeenyawo bavalela amasimi, iintshulube zesilika, imfuyo emithandathu, abantu abalahlekileyo, ukuvala amatyala oluntu, ilahleko (Mo Xing) Ukufuduka, i-conservative, impahla elahlekileyo, izifo kunzima ukubuyisela, ingcwaba entabeni, ithamsanqa
